meanings.sent1: The wild horse was unridable due to its fierce nature.
meanings.sent2: The broken bicycle was unridable and needed repairs.
meanings.sent3: Trying to ride the unridable horse was like attempting to tame a storm.
meanings.sent4: The unridable waves of the ocean crashed against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The unridable mountain stood tall and unconquerable in the distance.

meanings.sent1: The steep cliff was unridable for any cyclist.
meanings.sent2: The old, rusty bike was unridable and beyond repair.
meanings.sent3: The unridable horse seemed to mock the cowboys with its untamed spirit.
meanings.sent4: The unridable road twisted and turned like a maze of obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The unridable terrain challenged even the most experienced riders.
